name: raak
description: Intuivive TypeScript template to build local-first web apps. Implementation-ready. MIT license.
author: CellaJS <info@cellajs.com>

scripts.prepare: cross-env [ $NODE_ENV=development ] && lefthook install && code --install-extension biomejs.biome; exit 0
scripts.quick: pnpm --filter backend run quick & turbo dev --filter frontend --filter tus
scripts.dev: pnpm run clean && turbo dev  --filter backend --filter frontend --filter tus
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && turbo build --filter backend --filter frontend --filter tus
